name: uswds-webcomponents
description: U.S. Web Design System components as Web Components using Lit Element

scripts.storybook:clean: rm -rf node_modules/.cache/storybook node_modules/.vite storybook-static && echo '‚úÖ Storybook cache cleared. Run npm run storybook to restart.'
scripts.build:css: sass src/styles/styles.scss src/styles/styles.css --source-map --load-path=node_modules/@uswds/uswds/packages --load-path=node_modules && postcss src/styles/styles.css --replace --use autoprefixer
scripts.build:css:prod: sass src/styles/styles.scss src/styles/styles.css --source-map --load-path=node_modules/@uswds/uswds/packages --load-path=node_modules && NODE_ENV=production postcss src/styles/styles.css --replace
scripts.build: npm run sw:sync && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:css:prod && npm run css:tree-shake && tsc && vite build && npm run docs:update-optimization
scripts.build:watch: npm run build:css:watch & tsc && vite build --watch
scripts.build:optimized: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:css && npm run css:tree-shake && tsc && vite build --config vite.config.optimized.ts
scripts.validate:critical:fast: npm run validate:story-patterns && npm run validate:double-init && npm run validate:uswds-loader && npm run validate:attribute-mapping
scripts.validate:storybook-uswds: npm run validate:uswds-integration && npm run validate:uswds-loader && npm run test:uswds-integration
scripts.validate:full: npm run validate:critical:fast && npm run validate:click-events && npm run validate:slots
scripts.arch:check: npm run validate:architecture && npm run validate:option-b && echo '‚úÖ Architecture compliance verified'
scripts.validate:clean-code: npm run validate:ai-quality && npm run validate:refactoring
scripts.test:safe: npm run test:cleanup && npm run test
scripts.test:all: npm run test:ci && npm run test:storybook:ci
scripts.test:full-coverage: npm run test:ci && npm run test:integration && npm run test:storybook:ci
scripts.test:visual-regression: npm run test:browser && npm run test:storybook:ci
scripts.test:complete: npm run test && npm run test:browser && npm run test:storybook:ci
scripts.test:production-ready: npm run test && npm run test:browser-required && npm run test:storybook:ci
scripts.test:health-report: npm run test:validate-health && echo 'üìÑ See test-health-report.json for details'
scripts.test:regression:components: npm run test:regression:range-slider && npm run test:regression:in-page-nav
scripts.test:regression:all: npm run test:regression:comprehensive && npm run test:regression:structural
scripts.test:uswds:health: npm run test:uswds:config && npm run test:uswds
scripts.test:uswds:validate: npm run test:uswds:health && echo '‚úÖ USWDS integration is healthy'
scripts.audit:component-library: echo 'Archived - use npm run validate:uswds-compliance instead'
scripts.audit:full: npm run validate:uswds-compliance && npm run detect:over-engineering
scripts.maintenance:monthly: npm run check:guidelines-freshness && npm run detect:over-engineering
scripts.quality:check: echo 'Running quality checks (REQUIRED before commit):' && npm run test -- --run && npm run test:layout:ci && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run detect:over-engineering && npm run validate:uswds-compliance && npm run validate:registrations && npm run validate:slots && echo '‚úÖ All quality checks passed!'
scripts.cypress:test:interactive: bash scripts/generate-cypress-test.sh modal && bash scripts/generate-cypress-test.sh combo-box && bash scripts/generate-cypress-test.sh date-picker && bash scripts/generate-cypress-test.sh header && bash scripts/generate-cypress-test.sh table
scripts.cypress:test:forms: bash scripts/generate-cypress-test.sh checkbox && bash scripts/generate-cypress-test.sh text-input && bash scripts/generate-cypress-test.sh textarea && bash scripts/generate-cypress-test.sh select && bash scripts/generate-cypress-test.sh file-input
scripts.test:real-world: npm run test:ci && npm run test:rapid-interaction && npm run test:storybook:ci
scripts.test:pre-commit: echo 'Running pre-commit Cypress validation...' && npx cypress run --component --spec 'src/components/accordion/usa-accordion.component.cy.ts' --headless --quiet --config video=false,screenshotOnRunFailure=false
scripts.uswds:deep-check: npm run uswds:compliance && npm run uswds:monitor && npm run uswds:behavior
scripts.uswds:audit: echo 'Archived - use npm run validate:uswds-compliance instead'
scripts.uswds:sync: npm run uswds:check-updates && npm run uswds:update-classes && npm run uswds:compliance && npm run test:accessibility
scripts.uswds:investigate: echo 'Archived - manual investigation tool no longer needed'
scripts.validate:transformations:full: npm run validate:transformations && npm run validate:transformations:browser
scripts.validate:transformations:critical: echo 'üö® Testing critical high-risk components' && npm run validate:transformations:browser
scripts.validate:regression:combo-box: echo 'üìã Combo Box Regression Prevention' && npm run validate:transformations && echo 'Static validation complete'
scripts.validate:regression:time-picker: echo '‚è∞ Time Picker Regression Prevention (HIGH RISK)' && npm run validate:transformations && echo 'Run browser tests with: npm run validate:transformations:browser'
scripts.validate:regression:date-picker: echo 'üìÖ Date Picker Regression Prevention (HIGH RISK)' && npm run validate:transformations && echo 'Run browser tests with: npm run validate:transformations:browser'
scripts.validate:transformations:advanced: npm run test:cross-browser && npm run test:visual:regression && npm run test:performance:monitor
scripts.validate:all: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run validate:uswds-compliance && npm run validate:double-init && npm run test:critical
scripts.validate:compliance-regression: npm run validate:regression && npm run validate:accessibility-gate && npm run validate:uswds-optimization
scripts.docs:help: echo 'USWDS Web Components Documentation:' && echo 'üìö README.md - Project overview' && echo 'ü§ñ CLAUDE.md - Complete development guidelines' && echo 'üìñ docs/ - Implementation guides' && echo 'üß™ npm run test - REQUIRED before commit' && echo 'üé® npm run storybook - Visual testing'
scripts.testing:verify: npm run testing:health && npm run validate:all
scripts.test:tooltip-prevention: npm run test:dom-transformation && npm run test:storybook-iframe && npm run test:multi-phase-attributes && npm run test:light-dom-slots && npm run test:module-optimization
scripts.test:high-risk-components: npm run test:modal-validation && npm run test:accordion-validation && npm run test:date-picker-validation && npm run test:combo-box-validation && npm run test:time-picker-validation && npm run test:header-validation && npm run test:tooltip-validation
scripts.validate:uswds-patterns: npm run detect:initialization-issues && npm run lint
scripts.pre-commit:initialization: npm run detect:initialization-issues && npm run fix:initialization:guards:dry-run

author: Barbara Miles

*.component.cy.ts: echo 'Cypress test file updated, will validate rapid interaction tests in pre-commit hook'
